channel.title: What is a good game to code?
channel.description: What is a good game that is easy to learn in coding preferably java, i've had this urge to start coding a private server game that uses hamachi and shit. any suggestions?

item.title: What is a good game to code?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:16, topic:186956”][quote author=mrrules link=topic=249496.msg2101408#msg2101408 date=1205198728]

Was this entire thread a joke?

GTA is coded “with AMX”, lol.

Well the coding isn’t really called amx but it use the amx plugins which you can make you self.

amxmodx.org
[/quote]

What does a HalfLife server mod have to do with what language GTA was written in?[/quote]

He is talking about the GTA:SA servers. Fool It is clearly stated in:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: What is a good game to code?

[/quote]

item.title: What is a good game to code?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Cryme Time, post:5, topic:186956”][quote author=ninja nub link=topic=249496.msg2092915#msg2092915 date=1204882004]
Yeah, my game taste is pretty shallow. And narrowing it down to Java just made it to 3 games.

Club penguin (I think it’s java) and… I’m not sure. Spend an hour on google
[/quote]

ooooooohh lets go code a club penguin server. jesus dude what am i 3?[/quote]

I’m just trying to suggest. I don’t know any games in Java.
